name: Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon
overview: The paranormal needs putting back to normal. Nothing Luigi can't handle! ...Right? He may be a bit of a scaredy-cat, but armed with Professor E. Gadd's Poltergust 5000, Luigi is ready for action. Explore the haunted mansions of Evershade VAlley and take on paranormal pranksters in this spooky adventure! • Catch ghosts and uncover secrets using new gadgets such as the Poltergust 5000, the Dark-Light Device and more. • Team up with friends and other players worldwide in online multiplayer.
